pullrequest.title: Merge forward from ign-tools0 and bump to 1.0.0

content.raw:
[7b19cc4](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-tools/commits/7b19cc4d4d700ce71a4004546544a88a927550c6) This should install the `...-config.cmake` file in a separate directory.

The `ign` ruby script is not versioned. I wonder if we should install it in a versioned directory to allow side-by-side installations. Right now it installs in `<CMAKE_INSTALL_DIR>/bin`.
content.html:
7b19cc4 This should install the ...-config.cmake file in a separate directory.

The ign ruby script is not versioned. I wonder if we should install it in a versioned directory to allow side-by-side installations. Right now it installs in <CMAKE_INSTALL_DIR>/bin.
